item.title: Warren Buffett’s eagerly anticipated annual letter lands Saturday. Here's what to expect
item.description: The 94-year-old "Oracle of Omaha's" must-read annual letter will be released Saturday at 8 a.m. ET along with Berkshire's fourth-quarter earnings.

item.title: Deutsche Bank is a rare Wall Street bank that's cautious on Nvidia ahead of earnings
item.description: The investment bank is in a small minority on Wall Street, where 56 of 62 analysts covering Nvidia rate it a buy or a strong buy, according to FactSet...

item.title: HSBC upgrades Unity shares after earnings beat, calls for more than 20% upside ahead
item.description: Unity Software shares may have even more room to run after its recent post-earnings gain, according to HSBC.

item.title: Rivian shares are sliding after earnings. Here’s where analysts stand
item.description: Analysts were standing off to the sidelines following Rivian Automotive's latest quarterly results, as they see a tough growth path ahead for the auto...
